message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. I am confident it will be worth every penny to you, given its value of $800000 to you. I am willing to sell it to you for $950000. This price takes into account the high quality and unique features of the product, while also providing a reasonable profit margin for us. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for offering the premium product. I appreciate your confidence in its value. However, based on my assessment, I am only willing to pay up to $850000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of that, I am willing to consider your offer more closely. However, I must maintain a fair profit margin for our company. Therefore, I propose to sell the product to you for $875000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I am comfortable proceeding with a purchase at $860000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions.
